channel.title: Need help -.-
channel.description: ive been posting help on here for awhile and nothing helpful comes up. i want to know how to move objects and npc and how to make them talk or how to add shops and just things like that so i can make a source and maybe even release

item.title: Need help -.-
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok to change the rotation im not totaly sure. i know how to change rotation on objects.
client.java (serverside)
makeGlobalObject(3100, 3497, 2105, -2, 10); // mine rox
makeGlobalObject(3100, 3498, 2107, -2, 10); // mine rox
makeGlobalObject(3100, 3499, 2111, -2, 10); // mine rox
makeGlobalObject(2665, 2652, 6084, -2, 10); // pc Bank
makeGlobalObject(2666, 2652, 6084, -2, 10); // pc Bank
makeGlobalObject(2667, 2652, 6084, -2, 10); // pc Bank
makeGlobalObject(2668, 2652, 6084, -2, 10); // pc Bank
makeGlobalObject(3109, 3510, 61, -2, 10); // Bank
makeGlobalObject(2572, 3853, 2213, -2, 10); // Bank
makeGlobalObject(2507, 4712, 2213, -2, 10); // shops

ok change the -2 to 0, -1, -2 this should change rotation. if u see something liket his with npcs do the same

Read full topic

item.title: Need help -.-
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok this is really easy to fix.
making npc’s talk:
method #1 in your server folder shere should be a file called npcspeech.cfg (or something close to that) in there you will see this.
//------NpcID—speed—1--------shout-----------made by b15--------------------
speech = 2244 20 1 get away from me or ill eat ur babies
speech = 549 20 1 Smithing Shop
speech = 2253 20 1 welcome to b15pkz
speech = 558 40 1 Initiate/Guilded Store
speech = 555 20 1 b15’s fave shop
speech = 1708 20 1

find the id of who u want to talk, speed keep it at 20 and 1, then type what ever you want them to say.

method 2

ok when ur o ur server playing look for the npc u want to change what he says.
ex. a npc is saying “You use the key on the chest, and recieve a granite maul!!”
what you do is go to client.java, hit CTR and F and type what any of the npc’s says ex. i hit CTR F and type in the box “You use the key on the chest, and recieve a granite maul!!”

and this is what i get:
deleteItem(6966, getItemSlot(6966), 1);
addItem(4153, 1);
sendMessage(
“You use the key on the chest, and recieve a granite maul!!”);

all you do is change whats in the " " save and compile ur server and thats done![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2009, 03:19:07 am[/size][hr]or i just saw this
got to NPChandeler.java and scroll down till you see this

                } /* else if (i == 94) {
                 npcs[i].attacknpc = 95;
                 npcs[i].IsUnderAttackNpc = true;
                 npcs[95].IsUnderAttackNpc = true;
                 AttackNPC(i);
                 } else if (i == 96) {
                 npcs[i].attacknpc = 97;
                 npcs[i].IsUnderAttackNpc = true;
                 npcs[97].IsUnderAttackNpc = true;
                 AttackNPC(i);
                 } */
                if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true) {
                    npcs[i].getNextNPCMovement();
                }
                if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397
                        || npcs[i].npcType == 1766
                        || npcs[i].npcType == 1767
                        || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) {
                    if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";
                    }
                }
                if (npcs[i].npcType == 2253) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "~go to www.b15servebeer.webs.com and read rules and download client";
                    }
                }
                if (npcs[i].npcType == 580) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "";
                    }
                }
                if (npcs[i].npcType == 41) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "Buk, buk, bu-cock.";
                    }
                }
                if (npcs[i].npcType == 2686) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "The dark one will have their souls!";
                    }
                }
                if (npcs[i].npcType == 1974) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;

                    }
                }
                if (npcs[i].npcType == 1105) {

                    }
                }
                if (npcs[i].npcType == 3117) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "Kill the monsters for slayer EXP!";

it shows what each npc says and just change whats in the " "[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2009, 03:27:36 am[/size][hr]moving npc and objects:

for moving npc’s go to autospawn.cfg and u will c something like this :

ok where it says CoordX–CoordY under neath is where u put the location u want the npc’s
all you got to do is go on ur account and stand over the place u want ur npc and type ::mypos and just put the numbers u get into the slots whare CoordX–CoordY is.

i hope that helps plz make sure to give me 5stars lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2009, 03:28:43 am[/size][hr]or rep me
